gender.semantic_description: The gender of the student, indicating whether the student is male or female.

race/ethnicity.semantic_description: The race or ethnicity group the student belongs to, classified into predefined categories.

parental level of education.semantic_description: The highest level of education completed by the student's parent(s).

lunch.semantic_description: The type of lunch the student receives, indicating whether it is a standard or free/reduced lunch.

test preparation course.semantic_description: Indicates whether the student completed a test preparation course.

math score.semantic_description: The score achieved by the student in the mathematics section of the exam.

reading score.semantic_description: The score achieved by the student in the reading section of the exam.

writing score.semantic_description: The score achieved by the student in the writing section of the exam.

students_performance.role: Represents individual student performance records in various subjects.
students_performance.description: This table contains performance data for students, including demographic information and scores across different exams. It is used to analyze educational trends and evaluate factors contributing to students' scores.

database_description: The database captures demographic and performance data of students to analyze educational outcomes and identify factors that may impact student achievement in different subjects like math, reading, and writing.
